statements: DELETE FROM software_upgrades WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND upgrade_version = 2;
DELETE FROM software_upgrades WHERE device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000' AND upgrade_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_name = 'Light Bulb';
DELETE FROM smart_home_devices WHERE device_id = 101 AND firmware_version < 2.0;
DELETE FROM upgrade_history WHERE device_id IN (SELECT device_id FROM smart_home_devices WHERE firmware_version < 2.0);
DELETE FROM smart_home_devices WHERE firmware_version >= 2.0 AND device_id NOT IN (SELECT device_id FROM upgrade_history);
DELETE FROM software_upgrades WHERE device_id = 2 AND upgrade_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_devices WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174003' AND device_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174004';
DELETE FROM device_updates WHERE update_status = 'failed' AND update_timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM user_devices WHERE user_id = 'a1b2c3d4-e5f6-7890-1234-567890abcdef' AND is_primary = TRUE;
